Potatoes is the crop whiich is produced maximum in the year **2017**


```{r}
key_crop_yields %>%  
  group_by(year,crop) %>% 
  summarise(tonnes_per_hectare = sum(tonnes_per_hectare,na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year,
             y = tonnes_per_hectare,
             color = crop)) +
  geom_line()+
  labs(
    x = "Crops",
    y = "Tonnes Per Hectare",
    title = "Global Crop production"
  )
  

```
